## Feature Completion History

### 2026-02-15

- **PBI-44**: Background Attach Monitor — Audio notifications continue while attached to tmux; `navi status` CLI command for tmux status bar integration
- **PBI-42**: Audio Notifications — Configurable sound files and TTS announcements on session status changes with per-session cooldown

### 2026-02-12

- **PBI-37**: Task View Enhancements — Sorting, filtering, progress indicators, summary stats, group navigation, and manual refresh for the task panel

### 2026-02-09

- **PBI-33**: Agent Team Awareness — TUI correctly handles agent team sessions with inline team status display
- **PBI-32**: Scrollable Panels — All TUI panels scroll their content when overflow occurs
- **PBI-31**: Vim-Style Search — Exact-match search with next/previous cycling replaces fuzzy matching

### 2026-02-07

- **PBI-29**: In-App Content Viewer — View files, diffs, and task details without leaving the TUI

### 2026-02-06

- **PBI-28**: Task View — Pluggable task provider system for viewing project tasks from any source
- **PBI-27**: Enhanced Remote Management — Full feature parity for remote sessions (git, preview, kill, rename, dismiss)
- **PBI-13**: Search & Filter — Fuzzy search, status filters, and sort modes for quick session navigation
- **PBI-1**: Project Foundation — Go modules and core types
- **PBI-2**: Hook System — Claude Code hooks for status updates
- **PBI-3**: Session Polling — Session state management and polling
- **PBI-4**: TUI Rendering — Styled session dashboard with status icons
- **PBI-5**: Attach/Detach — tmux session attach and detach loop
- **PBI-6**: Installation — Automated install script
- **PBI-7**: Session Management — Create, kill, rename sessions from TUI
- **PBI-11**: Preview Pane — View session output without attaching
- **PBI-12**: Session Metrics — Token usage, time tracking, tool activity
- **PBI-16**: Git Integration — Branch, status, PR detection, diff preview
- **PBI-19**: Remote Sessions — SSH-based multi-machine session aggregation
- **PBI-26**: Token Metrics — Token usage from Claude Code transcript files
